message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. I think it's a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105. It's a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95? I'm really interested in the product and I think it's worth it to me at that price.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $102. It's getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to compromise to reach a deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $98? I'm really interested in the product and I think it's worth it to me at that price.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $100. This is my final offer, as I'm not willing to go any lower.
